ComicInfo.Summary: After The Charon crash-lands on a frozen planet, the crew is forced to fight together or die alone. Unfortunately, there’s a demonic betrayer in their midst… and something even worse lurking beneath the snow and ice.

ComicInfo.Title: Each Other's Throats Pt 5: Planetfall
